description:
* Based on the Chii`s Sweet Home manga series written and illustrated by http://anidb.net/cr2146 [Konami Kanata] and serialised in Weekly Morning.
http://anidb.net/ch7450 [Chii] is a kitten that accidentally got separated from its mother, and is now unable to find its way back home. Chii is found by a young boy called http://anidb.net/ch10238 [Youhei] and his http://anidb.net/ch10240 [father] and http://anidb.net/ch10239 [mother], who then give it a home, but what Chii really wants is to return to its mother.
